definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at

sentences.english: He has died to worldly matters and become a Buddhist monk.
sentences.chinese: 他已看破红尘，出家当和尚了。

sentences.english: Many people prefer to freelance from home.
sentences.chinese: 许多人愿意在家当自由职业者。

sentences.english: Then she came to Ye’s house as a nurse.
sentences.chinese: 便主动来叶城家当保姆。

sentences.english: What you all think of my Anta Swag?
sentences.chinese: 你们喜欢我的那些安踏赛前家当吗？

sentences.english: Major while is in family belongs ' curtilage female ' .
sentences.chinese: 大部分时间在家当‘宅女’。

sentences.english: She baby-sat for us occasionally, and I adored her.
sentences.chinese: 南西偶尔给我们家当小保姆，我非常喜欢她。

sentences.english: Before, he had been a servant to Dr Manette.
sentences.chinese: 从前他在蔓奈特家当过佣人。

sentences.english: So they acquire this family belongs when bought chaffy dish of a report.
sentences.chinese: 所以他们这次添置家当的时候购买了一台电火锅。

sentences.english: All of Yang's clothes and possessions sat on open shelves.
sentences.chinese: 杨所有的衣服和家当都放在一个架子上。
